class TREX::utils::TextLog

Detailed Description

Text Entry manager for TextLog.

This class is an utility created by TextLog to create a new atomic log entry. It is a string stream that buffers all the message and write it atomically to the TextLog instance that created him at its destruction.

Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>
